operation.add: $sWhereDotacao = PermissaoUsuarioEmpenho::getDotacoesPorAnoDoUsuario( db_getsession('DB_id_usuario'), db_getsession('DB_anousu'), PermissaoUsuarioEmpenho::PERMISSAO_MANUTENCAO, null ); $dbwhere.= " and (({$sWhereDotacao}) or e56_coddot is null) ";

$aContasPermitidas = PermissaoUsuarioConta::getContasUsuario(db_getsession('DB_id_usuario')); $sSqlContas = "select * from ({$sSqlContas}) as w where w.e83_conta in (".implode(',', $aContasPermitidas).")";
